definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: "Summer hours" are a long-established institution in the US.
sentences.chinese: “夏令时”制度在美国已实施很长时间。

sentences.english: Two years ago, the U.S. saved energy by starting daylight saving three weeks earlier.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，美国通过把夏令时提前三周来节约能源。

sentences.english: Pacific Daylight Time (PDT) is in use outside the camp.
sentences.chinese: 营外使用太平洋夏令时间。

sentences.english: The first year, only 19 states participated in daylight saving.
sentences.chinese: 第一年，只有19个州采用了夏令时。

sentences.english: Americans observed daylight saving, but they didn't like it.
sentences.chinese: 美国人遵循着夏令时，但是他们并不喜欢这样。

sentences.english: The English people will put on (the hands of) their clocks one hour for summer time the day after tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 英国人将在后天实行夏令时间，把钟拔快一小时。

sentences.english: You must address daylight savings time by business rules.
sentences.chinese: 必须用事务规则说明夏令时。

sentences.english: Summer time in Pittsburgh is time to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 在匹兹堡夏令时间的时候到户外工作。

sentences.english: The two most people encounter are leap year and daylight savings time.
sentences.chinese: 人们最常遇到的两种情况是闰年和夏令时。

pinyin: Ge2 lin2 ni2 zhi4 Biao1 zhun3 shi2 jian1
Ge2 lin2 wei1 zhi4 Biao1 zhun3 shi2 jian1
guo2 ji4 ri4 qi1 bian4 geng1 xian4
